1.title: Gold Beneath the Grime
1.plot: The Hansow family arrives in the city of Detroit and settles into the Detroit Loves You Guest Home. At Auntie Na's House, they find small acts of love transforming a rundown neighborhood and Jadyn finds belonging. The Hansows compete in a game of Fowling and head downtown to the Detroit Experience Factory for a private tour and a taste of the renowned Coney Dog.

2.title: A Dream-Making Place
2.plot: It's an early morning wake-up as the Hansow family goes to school to experience Matchbook Learning's revolutionary approach to education reform. The Hansows learn about the history of segregation in Detroit and Jadyn designs her own bag at Better Life Bags in Hamtramck. Morgan takes Jadyn to have her hair done and the smoke detector goes off at the salon.

3.title: Nothing Stops Detroit
3.plot: The Hansow family explores the art and produce of the Eastern Market before learning about food scarcity, volunteering, and experiencing the life-changing work of Forgotten Harvest. Jadyn and Asher feed some goats at an urban farm and Morgan and Dave meet up with entrepreneurs over Sushi at Our/Detroit. The Hansows speak to the hope and pioneering spirit they found in the people of Detroit.

1.title: It Feels Surreal
1.plot: The Hansow family embarks on the 36-hour journey to meet the Murray family. Introductions are made and the beauty and complexities of India are discovered.

2.title: If You Don't Laugh, You'll Cry
2.plot: The Hansow family visits the leprosy colony of KKM. The Murrays share their transition to living and parenting in India. Driving in India takes center stage and there are a few bumps along the way.

3.title: A Lot More Dance Parties
3.plot: Melody Murray shows the Hansow family around the impressive operations of JOYN. The Murrays invite the Hansows into the richness of their local community and everybody gets jiggy with it at a wedding.

4.title: It's a Joyride
4.plot: The Murrays invite the Hansows into their daily family life in breathtaking Mussoorie. Asher and Jadyn get the opportunity to go school with Micah and Levi. Dave Murray shares his epic daily motorcycle commute.

5.title: The Best Men I Know
5.plot: The Hansow family heads back down to the town of Rajpur to get a first-hand look into the incredible operations of Dehradun Guitar Company with Dave Murray. The Hansows host a roof-top karate showdown.

6.title: Lucky More Than Me
6.plot: Dave and Melody Murray share their heart for the people they love. The Hansows visit Streetsmart and explore the complexities of poverty. Santosh invites the Hansows to his home for tea and first-class hospitality. Dave and Morgan reflect on their time in India.

1.title: Saying Yes
1.plot: The Hansow family arrives in Nicaragua and meets Brad Corrigan, member of the band Dispatch and founder of the organization Love, Light and Melody. Brad shares his history with Nicaragua and then takes the Hansow family to Granada. A boat ride on Lake Nicaragua allows for some close encounters with some banana-loving monkeys.

2.title: Rainbows and Candy
2.plot: The Hansow family travel into the resettlement community of Villa Guadalupe to meet Kara and Gabriela with Beauty For Ashes. The Hansows visit the Nueva Vida trash dump where they meet people who spend their days scavenging through the trash to make a living. The Hansow family explores Nicaragua by taking a ziplining canopy tour of the Mombacho Volcano.

3.title: The Language of Kids
3.plot: Asher and Jadyn try some local Nicaraguan cuisine. The Hansow family ventures out Managua to Ruby Ranch where they meet Brinson Buzbee who has given his life to ensuring children in Nicaragua have a place to be kids. The Hansows take on some improvement projects around the Ranch and then let loose on the epic Ruby Ranch water slide.

4.title: Did You Just Punch Him?
4.plot: The Hansow family explore the beautiful town of Catarina and try some exotic local fruit. Dave has to enforce a little discipline. The Hansows learn about Lacrosse The Nations, an incredible organization that aims to sustainably improve education and health while creating joy and opportunity for children in need.

5.title: To the Beach
5.plot: Brad introduces the Hansow family to Fabretto and their Nica HOPE jewelry-making cooperative. The Hansows encounter the realities of traveling in the developing world - Jadyn gets a stomach bug and their van is stopped by the police. The Hansows take a trip to the beach where they are taught to surf for the first time by a professional surfer.

6.title: Day of Light
6.plot: Brad shares his vision for the Villa Guadalupe resettlement community and invites the Hansow family to participate in the Day of Light, an epic celebration of joy and beauty. From drumming to dancing and painting to singing, the Hansows celebrate with artists from all over the world who came to share their passions, including a surprise visit by musicians Rodrigo y Gabriela.

imdb.title: The Find
plot: A young couple and their two children embark on a worldwide search for compelling stories, risk-taking individuals, and life-changing projects.
